governance.description: Applies system policy, evaluates decisions, and enforces operational rules.

integrity.description: Ensures system files, manifests, and seals remain secure and unchanged.

telemetry.description: Provides heartbeat, system integrity, and sync tracking for monitoring.

predictive.description: Forecasts load patterns and identifies future operational states.

optimisation.description: Improves system behaviour based on incoming data patterns and load.

analysis.description: Performs pattern analysis and baseline comparisons.

emergentBehaviour.description: Generates higher order behaviour through fusion of system states.

audit.description: Maintains a verifiable chain of system logs, events, and seals.

runtime.description: Provides PowerShell and Node runtime support for internal tools.
